com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart.plotter.data

Class DataPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart.plotter.Plotter
      • com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart.plotter.data.DataPlotter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarPlotter, CandlestickPlotter, LinePlotter

    public abstract class DataPlotter
extends Plotter
    Base class for data plotters of timed data.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
